intent_atoms.description: Manual color usage must be migrated to FoundationUI design tokens before Phase 5.2 can be finalized.
Audit FoundationUI design tokens and map current opacity values to semantic tokens, then update all views to use DS.* tokens exclusively.
All affected view files must use DS.* tokens for color and opacity instead of hardcoded .accentColor and manual values.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures must be obtained before importing assets and refreshing regression baselines.
Import licensed assets and refresh regression baselines to validate tolerant parsing and export scenarios against real-world payloads.
Regression baselines are refreshed after asset import and validated with real-world payloads.
macOS hardware with 1 GiB performance fixture must be available before running lenient-vs‑strict benchmark.
Execute macOS 1 GiB benchmark, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them under Documentation/Performance.
Benchmark results are recorded in Documentation/Performance with specified environment variables.
Performance profiling and benchmarks will be manually executed using Xcode Instruments and CI integration will only after manual baseline creation.

functional_units.name: Design Token Migration
functional_units.description: Update view files to replace hardcoded colors and opacity values with FoundationUI design tokens (DS.*)
